MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH48 postcode area of Armadale, affecting properties in Lower Bathville and surrounding streets. Engineers are still on site carrying out investigations and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:56 PM on Thursday, 17 December 2020
